Package io.permazen.parse

Interface Parser<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - parsed value type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Command
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommand, AbstractKVCommand, AbstractKVCommand.BytesParser, AbstractRaftCommand, AbstractTransactionRaftCommand, AdditiveExprParser, AssignmentExprParser, AtomExprParser, BaseExprParser, BinaryExprParser, BitwiseAndParser, BitwiseOrParser, BitwiseXorParser, CastExprParser, CommandListParser, CommandParser, CompareSchemasCommand, CompositeIndexParser, ConditionalParser, DecodeKeyCommand, DeleteSchemaVersionCommand, EnumNameParser, EqualityParser, EvalCommand, ExprParser, FieldTypeParser, HelpCommand, ImportCommand, IndexedFieldParser, InfoCommand, InstanceofParser, JsckCommand, KVGetCommand, KVLoadCommand, KVPutCommand, KVRemoveCommand, KVSaveCommand, LambdaExprParser, LiteralExprParser, LoadCommand, LogicalAndParser, LogicalOrParser, MultiplicativeExprParser, ObjIdParser, ObjTypeParser, ParamParser, QuitCommand, RaftAddCommand, RaftFallbackForceStandaloneCommand, RaftFallbackStatusCommand, RaftRemoveCommand, RaftStartElectionCommand, RaftStatusCommand, RaftStepDownCommand, RegisterCommandCommand, RegisterFunctionCommand, RelationalExprParser, SaveCommand, SetAllowNewSchemaCommand, SetHistoryFileCommand, SetSchemaVersionCommand, SetSessionModeCommand, SetValidationModeCommand, SetVerboseCommand, ShiftExprParser, ShowAllSchemasCommand, ShowImportsCommand, ShowSchemaCommand, ShowVariablesCommand, UnaryExprParser, WordParser
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Parser<T>
    Generic parsing interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> Parser<T> applyIdentifierScope​(Parser<T> parser, Function<String,​Node> scope)
      Apply a new identifier scope, defined by the scope function, to the given Parser.
      T parse​(ParseSession session, ParseContext ctx, boolean complete)
      Parse text from the given parse context.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        T parse​(ParseSession session,
        ParseContext ctx,
        boolean complete)
        Parse text from the given parse context.

        Generally speaking, this method may assume that any whitespace allowed before the item being parsed has already been skipped over (that's a matter for the containing parser).

        Parameters:
        session - parse session
        ctx - input to parse
        complete - false if parse is "for real", true if only for tab completion calculation
        Returns:
        parsed value
        Throws:
        ParseException - if parse fails, or if complete is true and there are valid completions

      • applyIdentifierScope

        static <T> Parser<T> applyIdentifierScope​(Parser<T> parser,
                                          Function<String,​Node> scope)
        Apply a new identifier scope, defined by the scope function, to the given Parser.

        The returned Parser will parse the same as parser, except that any identifiers recognized by scope will be substituted accordingly.

        Type Parameters:
        T - parsed value type
        Parameters:
        parser - original parser
        scope - new identifier scope
        Returns:
        new Parser with identifier scope defined
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either parameter is null
